name: Hans Herrmann
introduction: Hans Herrmann is a former driver, who was born on February 23, 1928 in Stuttgart. He entered 19 Grands Prix (drove in 16), scoring 10 career points while recording one podium and one fastest lap. As a sports car driver, he had five class victories at the 24 Hours of Le Mans, and won the race outright in 1970, co-driving with Richard Attwood.
